b'Oni (TV)':
b'Tonko House has partnered with Japanese stop-motion house "dwarf" and CG studio Megalis on the new project. Tsutsumi is the directing showrunner of a stop-motion/CGI animated TV series called \xe2\x80\x9cOni,\xe2\x80\x9d about a human girl being raised by a mythical Japanese god.
